comment: How flexibility superpowers productivity : . Set your own schedule , oriented around your energy levels . Work when you're most focused , inspired . . Enjoy restorative breaks when they're most needed . Feel like exercising at pm ? Go for it . Sunny at :30 ? Enjoy time outside !
amr:
# ::snt How flexibility superpowers productivity : . Set your own schedule , oriented around your energy levels . Work when you're most focused , inspired . . Enjoy restorative breaks when they're most needed . Feel like exercising at pm ? Go for it . Sunny at :30 ? Enjoy time outside !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / superpower-01
            :ARG0 (f / flexibility)
            :ARG1 (p / productive-03)
            :manner (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (s2 / set-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s3 / schedule
                  :poss y)
            :manner (o / orient-01
                  :ARG1 y
                  :ARG2 (a2 / around
                        :op1 (l / level
                              :mod (e / energy)
                              :poss y))))
      :snt3 (w / work-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :time (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 y2
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (f2 / focus-01
                              :ARG1 y2)
                        :op2 (ii / inspire-01
                              :ARG1 y2))
                  :ARG3 (m2 / most)))
      :snt4 (e2 / enjoy-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (b / break-19
                  :mod (r / restorative))
            :time (n / need-01
                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 b
                        :ARG3 (m3 / most))))
      :snt5 (f3 / feel-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y4 / you)
            :ARG1 (e3 / exercise-02
                  :ARG0 y4
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :time "17:00")))
      :snt6 (g / go-03
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y4
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it))
      :snt7 a3
      :op1 (s4 / sunny
            :time (d2 / date-entity
                  :time "19:30"))
      :op2 (e4 / enjoy-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y4
            :ARG1 (t / time
                  :location (o2 / outside))))

comment: When I had a full-time job , I used these advantages to get a lot of work done on nights and weekends . Now , as an independent , I'm more focused and productive than ever . I design my days to best fit my energy levels , priorities , and preferences .
amr:

comment: The other superpower that goes hand-in-hand with this is discipline . You can't really consider flexibility a net good if you lack the discipline to buckle down and work - either for others or to improve yourself - a good bit of the time .
amr:
# ::snt The other superpower that goes hand-in-hand with this is discipline . You can't really consider flexibility a net good if you lack the discipline to buckle down and work - either for others or to improve yourself - a good bit of the time .

            :domain (d / discipline)
            :mod (o / other)

                  :ARG2 (h / hand-in-hand)
                  :ARG4 (t / this)))

                  :condition (l / lack-01

                        :ARG1 (d2 / discipline
                              :purpose (a / and
                                    :op1 (b / buckle-down-02
                                          :ARG0 y)
                                    :op2 (w / work-01
                                          :ARG0 y
                                          :purpose (o2 / or
